mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Plan and initial designs by Robert Adam. Building halted after Adam's death in 1792. Work restarted under Playfair, 1817. Work completed except for dome, 1827. Dome added by Rowand Anderson 1887. Courtyard redesigned and completed by Simpson and Brown, 2011. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Old_College,_University_of_Edinburgh; https://www.simpsonandbrown.co.uk/architecture/ruins-monuments/old-college-quad/ [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
